requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 零售调用来源（调用方和有赞约定的值）

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['version']=1540887487219
params['retail_source']="GUANJIAPO"
params['remark']="123"
params['refund_order_no']="201810301618070000010531"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.open.refundorder.refuse', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'1540887487219', 'retail_source' => 'GUANJIAPO', 'remark' => '123', 'refund_order_no' => '201810301618070000010531', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
';
var_dump(

);
echo '

name: refuse
